TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F Austin to Elias R Wightman, 04-17-1829

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin to Elias R. Wightman, April 17, 1829. Agreement to grant land.
barker_notes.barker_footnotes: Wightman's party was from New York. He himself became one of Austin's official surveyors.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 206-207

*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Elias R. Wightman, April 17, 1829. Agreement to grant land.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*For the sake of accomodating the *person_mentioned*families */person_mentioned*brought out by *person_mentioned*Elias R. Weightmann*/person_mentioned* and in order that they may have a *location_mentioned*home */location_mentioned*in the *location_mentioned*settlements*/location_mentioned*, I agree that they may have the *location_mentioned*quarter of a League out of the upper half of the League that was granted to *person_mentioned*James W Jones*/person_mentioned* */location_mentioned*which half League I bought of said *person_mentioned*Jones */person_mentioned*and the *location_mentioned*quarter of a League out of the upper half of the League that was grantd to *person_mentioned*E. Kuykendall*/person_mentioned* on the West side of the Colorado river*/location_mentioned* which half League I bought of said *person_mentioned*E. Kuykendall*/person_mentioned*—the said quarters must be laid off to extend *location_mentioned*from the river out to the back lines*/location_mentioned* of said Leagues—the side lines to be *location_mentioned*parallel with the side lines of the said League.*/location_mentioned* I will charge seventy five dollars in property for each of said quarter Leagues, payable in one year— Also the condition on which I make this offer is that each of said *location_mentioned*quarters */location_mentioned*must be actually sele[c]ted and inhabited and cultivated by one *person_mentioned*family*/person_mentioned* at least within *date_mentioned n="06-17-1829">two months from this day*/date_mentioned* and the *location_mentioned*settlement */location_mentioned*kept up on each of them without any intermission for at least *date_mentioned n="06-17-1832">three years in succession beginning two months from this date*/date_mentioned*, otherwise this offer is to be void and of no effect— Should the settlement be made on one of said *location_mentioned*quarters */location_mentioned*and not on the other, I am willing to comply with what I have stated above as to the quarter that is so settled— I allow *person_mentioned*Mr Elias E Weigh[t]man*/person_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="05-17-1829">One Month from this date*/date_mentioned* to give me an answer wheither the Above offer is accepted or not, and I shall require that notice should be given to me *date_mentioned n="06-17-1829">at the end of two months*/date_mentioned* wheither the settlement is made as above Stated or not—for if it is not made in that time then this offer is to be null and void it is also to be null and void if the *location_mentioned*settlement */location_mentioned*is not kept up for *date_mentioned n="06-xx-1832">three years in succession*/date_mentioned* as herein before stated— I am willing to take*person_mentioned* Elias E. Weigh [t] mans*/person_mentioned* note for the Amount which I have before stated is to be paid on the said land, and to make the transfer any time after the settlement has been made but always with the express condition that the said transfer shall be null and void if the settlement is not kept up for three years in succession as before Stated—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/person_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="04-17-1829">April 17, 1829*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p* *p*If the foregoing offer is accepted I wish it to be done in writing at the end of this paper or at the end of a true copy thereof signed by the persons who accept of the same*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*/div1*
